scripts.build: npm run beautify && npm run render
scripts.render: npm run render-index && npm run render-book
scripts.render-book: mustache -p partials/header.mustache -p partials/footer.mustache data/combined.json book.mustache > book.html
scripts.render-index: mustache -p partials/header.mustache -p partials/footer.mustache -p partials/introduction.mustache -p partials/purpose.mustache -p partials/landscape.mustache -p partials/climate.mustache -p partials/doctrine.mustache -p partials/leadership.mustache -p partials/glossary.mustache data/combined.json index.mustache > index.html
